page.title: 01Halesworth Introduction.
page.content: This section centres on the town of Halesworth ,in Suffolk ,which has a population of 4000. The section is mainly agricultural, whith barley,rape seed and wheat as the dominant crops and turkeys,chickens and pigs the main livestock. Halesworth has a predominantly elderly population with school rolls at present falling. The business section is focussed on The Thoroughfare which is the main road through town.There are two small industrial areas,one to the North and one to the South of Halesworth. The main sources of employment are Matthews turkey unit at Holton,retail buinesses,garages,estate agents and banks. The attraction of Halesworth is its lovely rural setting,but its heavy through traffic is a major drawback.
